Show Events based on the Canceled Field value
0 - ignore Canceled Filter (default)
1 - All other Filters must fit AND Event must be marked as Canceled
2 - If Event is marked as Canceled it is NOT listed
Show Events based on the TopEvent Field value
0 - ignore Top Event Filter (default)
1 - All other Filters must fit AND Event must be marked as Top Event
2 - If Event is marked as Top Event it will be listed, even other filters does not fit
